resources.string: Log In with your email and password or Sign In.

Tilting your device, you need to collect as many drops of water as possible, avoiding thunders. You have 3 lifes. 
You can decide to play offline or to play online with your friends. 
Creating a game you will get a code that you can share to play with others. 
If you already have a code you can insert it in the relative field and start playing.
Insert the location. You need to specify the city and the country. (<city>, <country>)
If you continue you will be logged out. \nDo you want to log out?
